name: Nights of Azure: GS Saikyou Combo Set - Super Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Nights of Azure
- Official Visual Book
- Original Soundtrack CD (2CD)
- Special Character 3D Card
- Character Poster
- Special A3 Size Wall Scroll Set (3pcs)
- Nights of Azure Original Tote Bag
- Nights of Azure Original Hand Towel
